name: DB
function: Define Byte - stores 8-bit values (numbers or strings) at the current location.

name: FCB
function: Form Constant Byte - same as DB, stores 8-bit values (common in 6800/6809 assemblers).

name: DW
function: Define Word - stores 16-bit values (2 bytes) at the current location.

name: FDB
function: Form Double Byte - same as DW, stores 16-bit values (common in 6800/6809 assemblers).

name: DD
function: Define Doubleword - stores 32-bit values (4 bytes) at the current location.

name: DF
function: Define Float - stores 32-bit floating point values at the current location.

name: DFF
function: Define Float F - stores 64-bit floating point values at the current location.

name: DFZXS
function: Define ZX Spectrum Float - stores numbers in ZX Spectrum 5-byte float format.

name: ORG
function: Origin - sets the program counter (PC) to the specified address.

name: EQU
function: Equate - assigns a value to a label. The label becomes a constant that cannot be redefined.

name: .SET
function: Assign - assigns a value to a variable. Unlike EQU, the value can be reassigned later.
Assign - assigns a value to a variable (alias for .SET).
Assign - assigns a value to a variable (alias for .SET).

name: DS
function: Define Storage - reserves the specified number of bytes without initializing them.

name: RMB
function: Reserve Memory Byte - same as DS, reserves memory bytes (common in 6800/6809 assemblers).

name: FCC
function: Form Constant Character - stores a string constant at the current location.

name: .CSTR
function: Counted String - stores a string with a leading length byte.

name: .PSTR
function: Pascal String - stores a string with a leading length byte (alias for .CSTR).

name: .ISTR
function: Inverted String - stores a string with the high bit set on the last character.

name: IF
function: Conditional Assembly - assembles the following code only if the condition is true (non-zero).

name: IFN
function: If Not - assembles the following code only if the condition is false (zero).

name: ELSE
function: Conditional Alternative - provides alternative code path for IF/IFN directives.

name: ENDIF
function: End Conditional - ends a conditional assembly block (IF/IFN/ELSE).

name: .CSEG
function: Code Segment - switches to the code segment where executable code is placed.

name: .DSEG
function: Data Segment - switches to the data segment for variable storage.

name: .ESEG
function: Extended Segment - switches to the extended segment for 32-bit data.

name: .BSSEG
function: Bit Segment - switches to the bit-segment for bit-addressable data (8051).

name: .PHASE
function: Phase - relocates code to a different address while assembling, used for code that runs at a different location than where it's loaded.

name: .DEPHASE
function: Dephase - ends phase-relative assembly, returns to normal address mode.

name: .BLOCK
function: Block Start - begins a block scope that limits label visibility to the block.

name: .ENDBLOCK
function: Block End - ends a block scope defined by .BLOCK.

name: .EXPORT
function: Export Symbol - marks a symbol as exported from a module for external use.

name: .EXTERN
function: External Symbol - declares a symbol that is defined in another module.

name: ALIGN
function: Align - pads the current location to the specified alignment boundary.

name: SETDP
function: Set Direct Page - sets the direct page register for 6809/65816 processors.

name: FILL
function: Fill - fills a region of memory with a specific byte value.

name: BSZ
function: Block Size Zero - reserves a block of bytes initialized to zero.

name: ZMB
function: Zero Memory Byte - same as BSZ, reserves zero-initialized memory.

name: .INCBIN
function: Include Binary - includes raw binary file contents at the current location.

name: .ERROR
function: Error - generates an assembler error with the specified message.

name: .ENT
function: Entry Point - defines the program entry point address.

name: .BINFROM
function: Binary From - sets the start address for binary output.

name: .BINTO
function: Binary To - sets the end address for binary output.

name: .ENGINE
function: Engine - specifies which CPU engine to use for assembly.

name: .M16
function: Mode 16 - sets 65816 to 16-bit accumulator mode.

name: .M8
function: Mode 8 - sets 65816 to 8-bit accumulator mode.

name: .X16
function: X Index 16 - sets 65816 index registers to 16-bit mode.

name: .X8
function: X Index 8 - sets 65816 index registers to 8-bit mode.
